name: Chroma Factory
description:
Chroma Factory is an abstract strategy simulation game about a colourful factory, inspired by Mini Metro and Rymdkapsel. Build a network that moves circles from colour-coded sources to their matching destinations. Expand the factory with tetromino pieces. Balance keeping the factory connected with ensuring traffic flows smoothly. Can you keep the factory running?

Controls: 

Mouse:

Rotate - Right Click

Place / Select - Left Click

Zoom In / Out - Scroll Wheel

Keyboard:

Move Cursor - Arrow Keys

Rotate - D

Place / Select - A

Zoom In / Out - W / S
